title: A girl was shot by a police sniper in a standing rock demonstration.
subtitle: The YouTube video that has since been removed falsely claimed that an 11-year-old girl in Standing Rock was shot and killed by a police sniper.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A 11-year-old girl was shot and killed by a police sniper at the protest site on the rock pipeline, but his news was covered by the media.
